67 -    def get_pool(self, route): 

68          """ get a pool for given route 
69   
70          where address is a tuple of (host, port) and ssl_args a dict 
71          containing ssl arguments 
72          """ 
73          self._lock.acquire() 
74          try: 
75              key = self.get_key(route)  
76              if key not in self._connections: 
77                  pool = self.POOL_CLASS(self, route, timeout=self.timeout,  
78                          nb_connections=self.nb_connections) 
79                  self._connections[key] = pool 
80              else: 
81                  pool = self._connections[key] 
82              return pool 
83          finally: 
84              self._lock.release()
